topic.title: How to generate accessible images in documentation

body.p: Images must have text alternatives that describe the information or function represented by them.
body.section:
Short text equivalents for images
When using image element, specify a short alternative text with the alt element. <<<<<<< HEAD:DITA/topics/whr-accessible-images.dita <image href="puffin.jpg"> <alt>Puffin figure</alt> </image> =======
<image href="puffin.jpg"> <alt>Puffin figure</alt> </image> >>>>>>> 3bde3099f... WH-1895 Documentation topic for DITA accessibility:DITA/topics/whr_images.dita

section.p: For complex images, when a short text equivalent does not suffice to adequately convey the function or role of an image, provide additional information in a file designated by the longdescref element.
